content: lion brand pattern number 40399-b2 or chs-rosettes corrections applied feb 27 2012 skill level easy level 2 gauge accuracy is not critical size s m l size will vary depending on thickness of yarn and size hook used gauge accuracy is not critical this pattern is all-purpose and any lion brand yarn can be used the thickness of the yarn determines diameter of rosette use the recommended crochet hook size found on the label of your lion brand yarn as shown in lion brand photo clockwise from top homespun #322 baroque k-10 5 \ 6 5 mm microspun #143 lavender h-8 \ 5 mm lion chenille #113 garnet h-8 \ 5 mm lion cotton #183 periwinkle f-5 \ 3 75 mm wool-ease #176 spring green j-10 \ 6 mm pin back or barrette back if desired thread and needle to attach to back of rosette worked in row solid-color and two-color versions are provided
